Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory184.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Capt., look! It's the beach! A beach that's just like the holos!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Yo... Wazzat in the distance? Is that a beach chair?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'A place like this actually exists in the world...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The giant building behind encircles the beach and the sea. A silence takes over.'}

{3: 'The slightly salty sea breeze blows the whimsical waves at you, causing droplets to fizzle on your face. It reminds you that this is not a holo-movie in Babylonia, but a place that physically exists.'}
{3: 'And the fine sand beneath your feet too, seeps slowly into your tactical boots from your weight, scratching your instep.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'So this must be what Celica meant by a "vacation"... I think I\'m starting to look forward to it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'The beach and the sea breeze... It does make one want to wind down...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Hnnh, why... do I feel kinda sleepy?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Constructs can feel sleepy?', 3: '257'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Hm... Probably an automatic response of our human-simulation modules... Commandant, can you help me turn it off?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "It's a vacation, though, Lucia. Don't you plan on relaxing a little?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Being seen through, Lucia suddenly begins to feel at loss.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "...I'm just worried that there might be combat, from what happened earlier.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'You have a point... THERE!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'While Lucia was talking, Liv has snuck around to the shallow waters behind Lucia and launched a handful of water at her.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Ah! Liv, what are you—', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'I\'m doing what they call a "water fight" back in the Golden Age. Lucia, join me!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The two girls step into the shallows and start splashing water at each other...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Don't say I didn't warn you two when salt crystallizes in your joints... You'll have to pop them open for maintenance...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Take it easy.', 3: '45'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '...Sigh, suit yourselves.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With Lucia and Liv in the lead, Sophia and Ayla join the water fight, too.'}
{3: 'Karenina was the last to join, but she laid waste to the most targets.'}
{3: '...Nobody had the slightest clue that her bazooka could fire water.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory184.png'}
{3: 'How much time has passed before today...?'}
{3: 'You feel like you have been battling for a long, long time.'}
{3: 'At that thought, you cannot help but look to the side...'}
{3: '...And see Kamui trying to use his Big Kamui as a... surfboard?!'}
{3: 'Chrome is trying to stop Kamui from doing so, but to little success.'}
{3: '...And look at Kamui now all drenched. No way Big Kamui can float.'}
{3: 'Speaking of, where is Liv and Lucia...?'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "You've been lying on the beach for a while. You might catch a cold.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'I feel pretty okay and comfortable.', 3: '66', 4: "Why don't you guys join me?", 5: '68'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "...The surrounding temperature is indeed quite pleasant. I guess you'll be fine.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'You hear sand shuffling—likely Lucia and Liv sitting down beside you.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'If there comes a day, when the battle against the virus is finally over...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'What will become of you, and us?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'There might be new battles to be fought, still.', 3: '76', 4: "I guess we'll all return to our daily lives.", 5: '83'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'New battles, huh...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'That honestly makes me a bit mixed up.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'But no matter where we are, or who we serve...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I am forever your blade, and this will never change.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'And we fight... so that there will come a day where no one has to anymore.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "So Commandant, if the day comes when you don't have to battle anymore... How would you like to live? I think Ayla mentioned that you have potential as an artist.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Will there finally be peace...? I surely hope so.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'When the virus is gone, along with the threat of the Corrupted...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'The things mentioned in the database about the Golden Age... Shopping malls, summer breaks, social networks—they will all come back, right?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: '...How would you like to live, then, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Would you like to study? Or work? If Ayla is right, you might have the potential to be an artist too!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'What do you think, Lucia?', 3: '85256', 4: 'What do you think, Liv?', 5: '44458'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "If Ayla's saying , she must have her reasons.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I'm also looking forward to what you will paint with a brush.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I've read that people had to paint in order to capture special moments before holograms and sensory simulations were invented.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "If these paintings were done by Commandant... I'd be looking forward to seeing what they depict.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Speaking of, we never really had the opportunity to think about our "future," didn\'t we?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "No, we didn't. I wonder... what will our future look like?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The... future?'}
{3: 'You have no idea.'}
{3: 'At least, your teachers from F.O.S. could not give you any answers about the future.'}
{3: 'It has taken so long and so many sacrifices for Babylonia to have a chance to fight back the insurmountable odds.'}
{3: 'To obtain the ultimate victory, Babylonia itself and everyone—this generation and beyond—from Babylonia offer themselves as kindling to humanity.'}
{3: 'Your sacrifices will only end on the day the Punishing Virus no longer threatens humankind.'}
{3: 'No one speaks of what happens afterward. Not your teachers, not the President.'}
{3: 'Not to mention that the things Lucia talked about sound more like the past instead of the future—'}
{3: 'The unattainable "Golden Age". Whenever you think about it...'}
{2: '(Smile mockingly)', 3: '107', 4: '(Smile wryly)', 5: '107'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Commandant? You realize you haven't said a word, right?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'I was just thinking about...', 3: '110'}
{2: '...Something funny.', 3: '111'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'What is it?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'You do not explain, and Lucia does not ask.'}
{3: 'But not everyone can read the room...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Commandant—whatcha talking about?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "I'm sorry, I already told him not to bother you...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "See? Commandant's not going to fault me!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "So...? That said, I must admit I'm curious about what you're talking about as well.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Seemingly drawn to the commotion, others begin to gather near you.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'What happens after we win...? Truly, I have not thought about that.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Neither have I.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Will Asslam be able to stop if the Punishing Virus is no longer a threat?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'The people of Akdilek can then find a piece of fertile land like Jamilah said...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "...They'll build a home again, brick by brick, like their ancestors. There will be enough food to feed everyone.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'But can the future really be that nice?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "...No. I'll believe what you said, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Why is everyone gathering here?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "I think we're discussing the future.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'The future? What about it?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Aren't you the slow one, bro? We're talking about what happens after the Punishing Virus is defeated!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'No one\'s your "bro"...! After the Punishing Virus is defeated?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "That's indeed our goal... but it's true that we haven't thought about what will happen to us afterward.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Right. A natural "lifespan" means nothing to us Constructs anymore.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Theoretically, all of us here will live to see that day. Except for...', 4: '1'}
{3: '...You feel like everyone turns to look at you at the same time.'}
{3: '...You should probably say something...'}
{3: '...If only just to make everyone feels better.'}
{2: 'I want to collect my pension alive.', 3: '156'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Hell yeah! You've been through so much with us, Commandant!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'I have absolute faith in you!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "True. The fight on the surface is going well. It's not a dream that we will establish some kind of safe zone.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "...Back to the topic. Let's think about what happens after.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Now, as the resident expert on the Golden Age, I\'m the most qualified to speak on the "future"!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "That's true.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Spit it out already! Do I get endless video games to play when the Punishing Virus is dealt with?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "I suppose... that's actually true.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Considering the output of the game industry during the Golden Age... there will be an infinite number of games available to you, Kamui...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "And an infinite number of buildings the Engineering Force has to rebuild, I bet. The future doesn't sound as good all of a sudden.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Kamui, stop fooling around...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'What about you, Lee? What would you be doing?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Me? I... never really thought about that.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "If I have to pick something, I'd be working toward getting Murray away from Babylonia duties and that hazardous line of work...", 4: '1'}
{2: "You're a good brother, Lee.", 3: '185', 4: 'But what about you, Lee?', 5: '186'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "No, I don't think I'll actually do that. It's Murray's personal wish to work for Babylonia, after all.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "That's why I said I never thought about it... I'm content to live to see the day the Punishing Virus is gone.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'How about we put our heads together and think of something?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Let's do it, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Everyone begins to chime in with what weird jobs from the Golden Age Lee should do...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "What about a doctor? It fits Lee's characters.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "I haven't received enough medical training to be any kind of doctor.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'I\'m sure they\'ll rebuild "med schools" after the Punishing Virus is gone.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Perhaps they'll enroll Constructs as students...", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Why won\'t he just "download" the information like how we download battle data...?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "He can do that, sure, but it sounds nice to learn in a classroom, like how we listen to briefings, doesn't it?", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'It sounds inefficient.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Does that mean you want to find something similar to what you do now, Lee?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Be a dual gunner like Cassidy Ross in "The Dancing Fishmonger Under the Moon"?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'That\'s not a "legal" career.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Once the threat is gone, I\'m sure people will start restoring "law"" alongside ""order."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'So, count me out of those risky businesses.', 4: '1'}
{2: '...What about an athlete?', 3: '218'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "...I've never thought of that, but it sounds like a perfect match, surprisingly...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Indeed. I've read that swimmers in the past would study fluid mechanics for their performances...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'It sounds like something Lee would consider.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Suddenly...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Show yourself!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Stop right there!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Almost immediately, Chrome extends his scythe and flings it while Karenina takes out her rocket launcher and bombards the direction where the movement came from.'}
{2: 'Line formation! Start searching!', 3: '238'}
{3: 'Everyone immediately forms a line, standing ten meters apart and moving forward, searching.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory191.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Here, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'You find a large number of disorderly footprints where Lee is pointing. The recesses are also hiding capsules covered in sand.'}
{3: 'Liv approaches and scans the capsules.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "...It's vital fluid, but something's wrong. This kind of vital fluid can only be found in early Constructs built in the Post-Pandemic Age.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "But it's been injected with many other substances so that it's now half as effective as our current one.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'A Construct?', 3: '250'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'It seems so.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'We should pursue, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Friend or foe, you cannot just ignore it.'}
{2: "Let's move."}
